original_text: Then Balaam said to the angel of the Lord, ‘I have done a wrong thing. I did not realize that you were standing in the road to stop me. If you do not want me to continue, I will return to my home.’
korean_text: 발람이 여호와의 사자에게 말하되 내가 범죄하였나이다 당신이 나를 막으려고 길에 서신 줄을 내가 알지 못하였나이다 당신이 이를 기뻐하지 아니하시면 나는 돌아가겠나이다

sentences.original_text: Then Balaam said to the angel of the Lord
that you were standing in the road
If you do not want me to continue
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 계속 가길 원치 않으신다면

sentences.original_text: I will return to my home'
